languages.text: "Меня впечатляет, как ты размахнулся на Веабосе-6. Может, тебе суждено написать новый Лекс Коронус? Но учти: Простор подчиняется силе и только силе".
"I am impressed with the way you went all out on Vheabos VI. Perhaps you are destined to write a new Lex Koronus. But be warned: the Expanse responds to force, and force alone."
languages.original_text: "Меня впечатляет, как ты размахнулся на Веабосе-6. Может, тебе суждено написать новый Лекс Коронус? Но учти: Простор подчиняется силе и только силе".

traits.locale_text: "I'm impressed with the way you went all out on Vheabos VI. Perhaps you are destined to write a new Lex Koronus. But be warned, the Expanse responds to force and force alone."
"I'm impressed with the way you went all out on Vheabos VI. Perhaps you are destined to write a new Lex Koronus. But be warned, the Expanse responds to force and force alone."
"I am impressed with the way you went all out on Vheabos VI. Perhaps you are destined to write a new Lex Koronus. But be warned: the Expanse responds to force, and force alone."

"I am impressed with the way you went all out on Vheabos VI. Perhaps you are destined to write a new Lex Koronus. But be warned: the Expanse responds to force, and force alone."

languages.text: 「君がヴィアボス・VIで全力を尽くした方法には感心したよ。おそらく君は、新たなレックス・コロヌスを書く運命にあるのだろう。だが警告しておくぞ。エクスパンスは力にのみ反応する。力こそが全てだ」
languages.original_text: "I am impressed with the way you went all out on Vheabos VI. Perhaps you are destined to write a new Lex Koronus. But be warned: the Expanse responds to force, and force alone."

traits.locale_text: 「君がヴィアボス・VIで全力を尽くした方法には感心したよ。おそらく君は、新たなレックス・コロヌスを書く運命にあるのだろう。だが警告しておくぞ。エクスパンスは力にのみ反応する。力こそが全てだ」

languages.text: "Es beeindruckt mich, dass Ihr auf Vheabos-VI alles gebt. Vielleicht seid Ihr dazu bestimmt, ein neues Lex Koronus zu schreiben. Aber seid gewarnt: Die Ausdehnung reagiert auf Gewalt, und zwar nur auf Gewalt."
languages.original_text: "I am impressed with the way you went all out on Vheabos VI. Perhaps you are destined to write a new Lex Koronus. But be warned: the Expanse responds to force, and force alone."

traits.locale_text: "Es beeindruckt mich, dass Ihr auf Vheabos-VI alles gebt. Vielleicht seid Ihr dazu bestimmt, ein neues Lex Koronus zu schreiben. Aber seid gewarnt: Die Ausdehnung reagiert auf Gewalt, und zwar nur auf Gewalt."

languages.text: « Je dois admettre que le zèle dont vous faites preuve envers Vhéabos-VI m'impressionne. Vous êtes peut-être destiné à écrire cette nouvelle Lex Koronus. Mais je préfère vous prévenir : les Étendues ne ploient que face à la force. La force la plus brute. »
languages.original_text: "I am impressed with the way you went all out on Vheabos VI. Perhaps you are destined to write a new Lex Koronus. But be warned: the Expanse responds to force, and force alone."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois admettre que le zèle dont vous faites preuve envers Vhéabos-VI m'impressionne. Vous êtes peut-être destiné à écrire cette nouvelle Lex Koronus. Mais je préfère vous prévenir : les Étendues ne ploient que face à la force. La force la plus brute. »

languages.text: «Me ha impresionado el modo en que lo dio todo en Vheabos VI. Quizá esté destinado a redactar una nueva Lex Koronus. Pero se lo aviso: la Extensión responde a la fuerza, y nada más que a la fuerza».
languages.original_text: "I am impressed with the way you went all out on Vheabos VI. Perhaps you are destined to write a new Lex Koronus. But be warned: the Expanse responds to force, and force alone."

traits.locale_text: «Me ha impresionado el modo en que lo dio todo en Vheabos VI. Quizá esté destinado a redactar una nueva Lex Koronus. Pero se lo aviso: la Extensión responde a la fuerza, y nada más que a la fuerza».

languages.text: “你在维博斯六号星全力以赴的身影给我留下了深刻的印象。或许你命中注定要将帝国的律法再次带到科罗努斯扩区，但别忘了，科罗努斯扩区崇尚暴力，而且只听从暴力。”
languages.original_text: "I am impressed with the way you went all out on Vheabos VI. Perhaps you are destined to write a new Lex Koronus. But be warned: the Expanse responds to force, and force alone."

traits.locale_text: “你在维博斯六号星全力以赴的身影给我留下了深刻的印象。或许你命中注定要将帝国的律法再次带到科罗努斯扩区，但别忘了，科罗努斯扩区崇尚暴力，而且只听从暴力。”

languages.text: "Vheabos VI'da yaptıkların beni etkiledi. Belki de kaderinde yeni bir Lex Koronus yazmak vardır. Yalnız şunu unutma: Enginlik, sadece ve sadece kudrete yanıt verir."
languages.original_text: "I am impressed with the way you went all out on Vheabos VI. Perhaps you are destined to write a new Lex Koronus. But be warned: the Expanse responds to force, and force alone."

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos VI'da yaptıkların beni etkiledi. Belki de kaderinde yeni bir Lex Koronus yazmak vardır. Yalnız şunu unutma: Enginlik sadece ve sadece kudrete yanıt verir."
